name: Realm Crosser
description:
Breeze got the power to get out of his physical body after witnessing his friends' death on the Demon Lord's Pallace. Now he can travel to different worlds... Use the power to form a party of 4 and defeat the Demon Lord!

Credits: RPG Maker (Assets), Yanfly & SumRndmDde (Scripts), Feraldy Naufal (graphics & music)
